name: Hell in Hostel
description:
Well, your holidays could have gone better. Creepy hotel, monsters at every corner... Luckily you have plenty of items at your disposition to scare them off! Use them wisely!

This game was made for the Blending Jam 2017 (theme: All In One), and was presented at the Brussels International Festival of Fantastic Films.

Game made by :
- Thomas Stassin
- Esther Roux
- Sophie Roch
- Quentin Descurieux
- Alice Rouben
- Roxanne Samson
- Floriane Limbourg

Additional thanks:
- Bastien Gorissen & Martin Schmaczried (Music)
- Pablo Schwilden Diaz (sounds)
